tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Boxers (
  boxer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(50),
  weight_class VARCHAR(20),
  age INT,
  training_schedule JSONB,
  progress_over_time JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE boxers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  weight_class VARCHAR(20),
  height FLOAT,
  dob DATE
);

CREATE TABLE training_schedule (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  boxer_id INT,
  date DATE,
  session_duration INT,
  session_type VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (boxer_id) REFERENCES boxers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE TrainingSchedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    boxer_id INT,
    date DATE,
    workout_type VARCHAR(100),
    duration_minutes INT
);

CREATE TABLE Progress (
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    boxer_id INT,
    date DATE,
    weight_kg DECIMAL(5,2),
    body_fat_percentage DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE TrainingSessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_date DATE,
    duration_minutes INT,
    trainer VARCHAR(50),
    boxer_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (boxer_id) REFERENCES Boxers(boxer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WorkoutProgress (
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_id INT,
    workout_name VARCHAR(50),
    reps_completed INT,
    weight_lifted FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (session_id) REFERENCES TrainingSessions(session_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    boxer_id INT,
    date_visited DATE,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    treatment_plan TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (boxer_id) REFERENCES Boxers(boxer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TrainingSchedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    boxer_id INT NOT NULL,
    session_date DATE NOT NULL,
    session_time TIME NOT NULL,
    session_duration INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ProgressTrack (
    track_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    boxer_id INT NOT NULL,
    track_date DATE NOT NULL,
    weight_kg DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    training_intensity INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE MatchHistory (
    match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    boxer1_id INT NOT NULL,
    boxer2_id INT NOT NULL,
    winner_id INT NOT NULL,
    match_date DATE NOT NULL
);
